certifications.description: Completed a 8 month course of Data Science from Physics Wallah.
certifications.title: Data Science

projects.name: Email Spam Detector
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to classify emails as spam or not spam. Utilized Python, scikit-learn, and Natural Language Processing techniques. Implemented a Naive Bayes classifier for email classification. Achieved a 95% accuracy rate in spam email classification.

projects.name: Car Price Prediction Model
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to predict car prices based on various features. Employed Python, pandas, scikit-learn for data preprocessing and modeling. Utilized regression analysis techniques. Improved car price predictions with an R-squared value of 0.85.

projects.name: Diabetes Detection Model
projects.description: Built a machine learning model using Python, pandas, and scikit-learn. Predicted diabetes presence with an 85% accuracy rate. Conducted data preprocessing, model selection, and hyperparameter tuning. Addressed class imbalance and identified opportunities for future improvements. GitHub repository available for project details.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a personalized movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based approaches. Enhanced recommendation quality by combining these methods. Achieved an 96% accuracy rate in movie suggestions. Addressed data sparsity and scalability challenges. Future improvements include real-time recommendations and user feedback integration.

projects.name: Credit Card Fault Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model for detecting fraudulent credit card transactions. Utilized Python, pandas, scikit-learn, and imbalanced dataset techniques. Preprocessed and analyzed transaction data, identifying patterns and anomalies. Implemented algorithms like logistic regression, decision trees, or random forests for fraud detection. Achieved a high detection accuracy, reducing financial losses due to fraud. Continuously improved the model to adapt to evolving fraud patterns. Contributed to enhanced security and risk mitigation in financial transactions.

experiences.description: Developed a machine learning model to classify emails as spam or not spam. Utilized Python, scikit-learn, and Natural Language Processing techniques. Implemented a Naive Bayes classifier for email classification. Achieved a 95% accuracy rate in spam email classification.

full_output.name: J ATIN MADAAN
achievements_and_awards: Consistently ranked among the top 5 students academically.
Completed advanced coursework in Data Science and Data analyst, gaining expertise in data analyzing skills.
Actively participated in the Smart India Hackathon (SIH) and qualified internally.
